biotools.summary: Named Entity Recognition and Normalization Applied to Large-Scale Information Extraction from the Materials Science Literature | Public API for the Materials Scholar database | matscholar (Materials Scholar) is a Python library for materials-focused natural language processing (NLP). It is maintained by a team of researchers at UC Berkeley and Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory as part of a project funded by the Toyota Research Institute
